data.text: After the introduction of the aircraft, #CEAir currently operates a total of 416 @Airbus airplanes, including 350 #A320 series aircraft, 56 #A330 aircraft, and 10 #A350 aircraft. CEAir's Airbus fleet is the second largest in the world and the largest in Asia. https://t.co/meBqrWZ2r2

data.text: The @Airbus A350 delivered in #Tianjin on July 21 is the 1⃣0⃣th of the 2⃣0⃣ of this type ordered by #CEAir. The Airbus #A350 is a new-generation flagship aircraft of CEAir, which mainly serves in our major domestic routes and long-distance routes in Europe. https://t.co/W2E5uu7Yt4

data.text: We will donate 20 million yuan ($3.09 million) to the Henan Charity General Federation in support of the flood relief efforts in Henan Province. #CEAir is ready to provide air transport and other necessary assistance at any time. https://t.co/HV0hYpz5Uk

On July 21, CEAir received Airbus's first A350 aircraft delivered in China in Tianjin. The A350 aircraftis equipped with a new generation of the world's top cabin service system, which will provide passengers a better experience. https://t.co/0gq4wfaif4

🏰The Fujian #Tulou are well-known for their shape and style. Hakka people built Tulou so that generations of family can be safely “enclosed” inside and live happily together. Would you like to have a look at this castle in the orient?
#TravelwithCEAir #VisitXiamen @china_xiamen https://t.co/VUCYGCItcL

data.text: Transformed from an old fishing village, the bustling community Zengcuoan is now crowned the most artistic fishing village in China. Come and visit #Xiamen ! Take your time to feel the charm of every brick and tile and unlock the stories behind it. #TravelwithCEAir @china_xiamen https://t.co/UjSohjmDsI

Curious about how #CEAir prepared for the inaugural flight from #Chengdu Tianfu Airport to #Shanghai ? Let our Italian Captain Diego show you the stories behind it! Here are some highlights from that day!  #WorldKaleidoscope @xwcd2015 
Full version :https://t.co/cGBkJ031zC https://t.co/VsN16AZdnQ

🍻Raise your cup and toast to friendship! 
Leave your location in the comment section. Cheers to the ones who live in the same city as you and have a bubbly #SummerWithCEAir . #CEAir https://t.co/PKkLxh8Rlp
Hello #Toronto ! Greetings from our CIIE-themed flight and our #CEAir team. 💙💙💙 https://t.co/RCGE7mjAxG

data.text: Epidemic prevention is our top priority! Our crew members at #CEAir have disinfected the cabin to make sure every passenger has a safe and comfortable journey~💙🤍💙🤍💙 https://t.co/HjU88wVoao

Want to learn more about Minor Heat? #24solarterms
Click here: https://t.co/AYWNYJfSSn https://t.co/1qvVJd8xil

🌿Today is one of the #24solarterms , Minor Heat (Xiaoshu). High temperatures are good for the growth of the lotus flower. From Minor Heat to the Double Ninth Festival, the lotus flower is in full bloom, and always simple but elegant. https://t.co/TSVbV7K6mP

They are the "guardian angels" on your flights. With them around, there is nothing for you to worry about. Equipped with an intelligent security system, our professionally trained air security staff of China Eastern Airlines will escort you throughout your journey. #CEAir https://t.co/AwgYxhxi3T

🍦This was the dessert served to passengers on #CEAir 's maiden flight at #Chengdu #Tianfu Airport. 
Does this ice pop look familiar to you? It resembles a mask found at the #Sanxingdui Ruins in #Sichuan province. Bite after bite, a little surprise awaits~😊 https://t.co/AoEaZgL5Aj

data.text: At China Eastern Airlines, there is always someone serving you silently but attentively. Our integrated management team has "invisible" superpowers. Whenever needed, they will always be there for you! #CEAir https://t.co/11bxt75uTn

🧑‍✈️Before flying, our #CEAir pilots always run a routine body check, which includes blood pressure, pulse, etc. the good physical condition of crew members helps guarantee the safety of our passengers. https://t.co/kYyb6soS7h
🐘🐘🐘This video is provided by Yunnan Provincial Department of Culture and Tourism.

❓Are you curious about the taste of roses? Flower cakes filled with edible roses is one of the typical dim sum dishes in #Yunnan. Crispy and flaky pastry, flowery and aromatic flavor…yum yum! 
🐘That’s why the #elephants also want to have a bite~ #TravelwithCEAir @goyunnanchina https://t.co/OTy1WlhKn6

data.text:
☀️With beautiful sunrises and sunsets☀️
❤️#CEAir will always be by your side❤️ https://t.co/pIQbZnhPU4

If you want a relaxing trip, the Fuxian Lake in Yuxi city is definitely a good option👍. It is like a pearl inlaid in the mountains of #Yunnan . 🐘🐘🐘No wonder the elephants stopped by at such a beautiful place. #TravelwithCEAir & #elephants  @goyunnanchina https://t.co/kPWYEdbuIt

The skyline of #Shanghai is spectacular, so does the views down to the ground. Check out the streets, the shops, the restaurants...You will understand why it is known as the city that never sleeps. #TravelwithCEAir https://t.co/iXYu6IF24C

#Chengdu #Tianfu Airport covers an area of 50 square km. To be constructed in two phases, the airport will have 6 runways and house terminals taking up 1.26 mil square meters, capable of handling 90 mil passengers annually and 2 mil tons of cargo and mail annually by 2045. https://t.co/Xig6Az8NpQ

🌸This spring, #CEAir showed you the beauty of China’s villages and told stories about the changes in people’s lives, jobs, residence, education and health care. This photo wall poster is made from 100 photos collected. Let’s go through them together! 🌸#100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/QhMx50o0uc

On June 27 11:42, #CEAir CIIE-themed airplane took off from #Tianfu Airport, taking 310 passengers to #Shanghai. This marks China Eastern’s official flight operation at this newly-built airport. Our Italian Captain Diego handed out "commemorative boarding passes" for passengers. https://t.co/RQDRT7XPQv

data.text: On June 22, #CEAir launched "Courtesy Service Area" in five hub #airports ! Providing full escort and drop-off services, this area is set up for people with special needs, such as unaccompanied children, the elderly and passengers with mobility impairments. #MUNews https://t.co/P1w4qxXVdt

By 2020, #CEAir has renovated 66 village clinics, benefiting 60,000+ people. A new high school teaching building was also constructed which is a huge gift for thousands of students there. CEAir will continue our RESIDENCE INNOVATION plan in underdeveloped areas. #DecodeCEAir https://t.co/E0dHR1bwo1

🐘Following the elephants’ lead, we come to Pu'er, #Yunnan. 
🫖Don’t miss the famous Pu'er tea if you get a chance to visit. Many tea addicts go crazy for its mellow taste. 
❓Do you know why tea is always compressed into a round cake-like shape? #TravelwithCEAir @goyunnanchina https://t.co/m6OH4OdqBu

Farmers in #Yunnan have created their own brands, turning agricultural products into star products. Honey, tea and chicken made in local styles have reacheda broader market and an INDUSTRY has been BUILT, thanks to thepoverty reduction fund established by #CEAir. #DecodeCEAir https://t.co/0YnDF5xl6O

data.text: #Sichuan #Chengdu Tianfu Airport will start operating at the end of June! As one of the four base airlines of Tianfu Airport, #CEAir will transfer some flights from Shuangliu Airport to Tianfu Airport starting on June 28. Many routes will have flights every day~@xwcd2015 https://t.co/ieTGc3PPkc

Giving full play to our industrial advantage, #CEAir tried to help the local economy “fly” higher. In 2020, CEAir resumed the air routes to Lincang and Cangyuan in #Yunnan asap, to promote JOB CREATION and help generate income for locals during the epidemic. #DecodeCEAir https://t.co/NKwjVKmyYy

🎉Today is the 2⃣1⃣st anniversary of @skyteam . As a member of the #skyteam , China Eastern Airlines also sent blessings. #CEAir hopes that in the future journey, we can fly higher and farther together!🤝🤝 https://t.co/sNUqV9eoSS

data.text: The Electric Log Book (ELB) was just launched in #CEAir! This is the 1st time that China's civil aviation has officially replaced paper flight record books with ELB. Don’t underestimate this little pad. It can help CEAir save 20 million yuan (300 million USD) a year! #MUNews https://t.co/PVC3137kYg
🎉Happy 1️⃣0️⃣th Anniversary! @skyteam We will be holding hands and heading towards our next ten years of great cooperation together! ✈️❤️ #CEAir #skyteam #anniversary https://t.co/1wyaIwb8Pi

data.text:
#TravelwithCEAir & adorable #elephants 🐘🐘🐘
“Any ideas about what the elephants did last week?”
“Yes, I always followed their movements! They took a nap together!” https://t.co/R8Ob75Bsp9

"It's like a city of the future." Diego made no secret of showing his love for #Shanghai .❤️ Since joining #CEAir in 2018 as a captain, Diego has lived in China for 3 years. Want to see his lifestyle in China? ▶️Click on the video below. https://t.co/i3WOqpqyCq

Da, dada, dadada… Do you know what this cutie is used for? Let's guess. 
💡Hint: You'll often see it in the hands of a flight attendant when boarding an airplane. #CEAir https://t.co/0iEUCR5NZV

The #DragonBoatFestival is always coming with mid-#summer . On this day, people commemorate the poet Qu Yuan of the Warring States Period. People wrap bamboo leaves in rice and throw them into the river, to recall his loyalty and devotion for the country. https://t.co/uDMmdTgFeS

annotations.normalized_text: Qu Yuan of the Warring States Period

data.text: Want to learn how to make a cute paper zongzi? Let #CEAir show you how~ #dragonboatfestival https://t.co/BwANmp20yE

Wearing colorful rope bracelet is a tradition of the #dragonboatfestival . On this day children are encouraged to wear colorful bracelets to stay safe and drive away evil spirits. Now, #CEAir ties this lucky bracelet for our young passengers, wishing them health and happiness. https://t.co/WeAg4xDl6U

There are many traditional customs for the #dragonboatfestival , and wearing colorful rope bracelets is one of them. Making colorful ropes for relatives and friends is a good way to send blessings. Let's learn how to braid a colorful rope together with #CEAir https://t.co/yyAZIiXwZM

This year is Lucine Magand's 7⃣th year in #Shanghai and her 4⃣th year as a flight attendant. Over the years, she has experienced different charms of Shanghai and Paris when she travelled between the two cities. ▶️Click on the video and find out a new look of Shanghai. #CEAir https://t.co/iI3g2E1JkB

In 2020, #CEAir opened multiple international cargo routes in #Zhejiang Province, despite the difficulties caused by the epidemic. In the future, CEAir will further our cooperation with #Ningbo, contributing more to the city’s trade development! @InsightNingbo @InZhejiang https://t.co/ti2xeMGqGa

On June 9, Eastern Airlines Logistics (EAL), a subsidiary of China Eastern Airlines, was listed on the main board of the Shanghai Stock Exchange (abbrev.: Eastern Airlines Logistics, code: 601156), becoming the first stock of mixed ownership reform in China's aviation industry. https://t.co/J3YpNnbkfD

Check out the 3rd episode of #100beautifulcountryroad, “the class is on✏️📗🖊️”. With the support of #CEAir, kids in the countryside are able to realize their dreams and explore the world. This time, our pilots prepared a special class for the children in Shuangjiang, #Yunnan . https://t.co/4DE1bPczes

Here comes “Heart to Heart ❤️2⃣❤️”, the 2nd episode of #100beautifulcountryroad. The Internet connects people and hearts. New ideas have been brought to Cangyuan, #Yunnan through CEAir's sky road. ▶️Find out how #CEAir helped local people sell their special products in the video. https://t.co/jstkq7odZv
Salty and slightly fishy- this is the taste of the sea. Fly for love, feel the nature, and protect the oceans. #CEAir #WorldOceansDay @WorldOceansDay https://t.co/QdSUGUZIEr

"Now I live here, and I'm not even here now, I'm in the future. China is the future." Diego, an Italian captain of China Eastern Airlines, said. He settled down in China 3 years ago. Wanna know why he chose here? 
▶️Click on the video to find more about Diego's story. #CEAir https://t.co/aaZgxw4U4Y

There are 3 photos that shined from our photo collection campaign. Follow our lead and let’s discover the stories of #CEAir in the places shown in the photos. Today, we present you the 1st episode of #100beautifulcountryroad: Sky Dream. https://t.co/6mOOAMZS1k
🌞Morning! #CEAir invites you to enjoy a cup of "happy summer" with us🥤. Come quickly~ https://t.co/TJ8A0Fdzzj

Want to learn more about Grain in Ear? #24solarterms
Click here: https://t.co/gNV0gFzn8y https://t.co/4YTBtg5FAm

Today is one of the #24solarterms, Grain in Ear (Mangzhong). Its arrival means the departure of flowers, and the ribbons on the trees are the god of flowers kissing them goodbye. Fruits become the new leading role, absorbing the energy of summer and waiting for harvest. https://t.co/GJRQ19QHjp
Every journey has a meaning and a purpose. Fly for love, and protect our planet.❤️❤️ #WorldEnvironmentDay #CEAir https://t.co/ch2KRo9dWh
Check out the story about our beautiful flight attendant Lucine👩‍✈️ and her air diary in #Shanghai and #Chengdu . https://t.co/w8BOWgAeyq

This is the last flight carried out by Captain Shangguan. He has flown in the sky for 42 years, with a total flight time of more than 2,600 hours. Captain Shangguan flew every flight carefully and tried his best to take every passenger to their destination safely and comfortably. https://t.co/4l854dmZAq

Building an “Air Bridge” between China and Hungary ! The 2nd China-CEEC Expo & International Consumer Goods Fair is coming soon in #Ningbo, #Zhejiang! Taking this chance, #CEAir opened a Ningbo-#Budapest direct cargo route, operating two flights a week. @InsightNingbo @InZhejiang https://t.co/py1OxfLgvV

🥳#CEAir Sichuan Branch welcomes the new member, Airbus A320NEO #airbusa320 , to join our family! Let's get ready to take off from #Chengdu Tianfu International Airport! @Airbus https://t.co/H9xz5Qth78
